text: Mamimi, shall we head out soon?

Haha-
looks like I got caught.

I was planning to switch the contents
of Producer's coffee with soy sauce.

You seemed quite bold about it,
but you don't seem to mind getting caught anymore...

Well, hiding it is one thing,
but I realized it's not fun if it doesn't get discovered.

If it doesn't get discovered,
I won't get to see Producer's reaction, right?

So, you were doing it even where you wouldn't get caught...
When I think about it that way, there are a few instances...
